channel.title: Ouija Boards
channel.description:
I'm extremely fond and interested in the Supernatural for some reason.. I suppose it's just my curiosity of the unknown.
Has anyone here had any experiences with Ouija Boards? Do you believe that they work? Discuss.
(I found some stories at this site: http://www.graveaddiction.com/ouija.html)

item.title: Ouija Boards
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

They were very common a few sects of the chrisitan church during WW1 & 2 (mainly 2).

Hex Key:

No problem, make sure you read the stickes they should have all the answer you need and links to the relavent texts. Have fun

how do i become a super saiyan?I really want to know I wanna fight freeza!
I don’t think them boards will work…You never know I saw a afro ghost with a popes hat on
No i wasn’t high/drunk…I was awake…

item.title: Ouija Boards
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

goatee:

Interesting i guess but whats the point?

For me It’d be sort of an Adrenaline rush but without moving, if it worked. Think about it, something from the other side talking to you, watching you. But if you were bored i guess you could just be like “Yo Mum i’m bored, gonna’ go talk to some Demons for a while.”

It’d be interesting to ask how they died, finding out how old they are/their name, where they lived, if they watch you (Perverts) and everything else.

[quote=“Hex Key, post:15, topic:78906”]If you beginning to get into this Kane and are serious i recommend going to the community:
http://www.occultforums.com/

I used to run a section on the magical and medicinal properties for the
I dont anymore i got fed up of the tards asking “how do i become a super saiyan”

There are some very clever people there who would love to help you.[/quote]
Thanks, Hex.

Read full topic

item.title: Ouija Boards
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:13, topic:78906”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=115824.msg1144217#msg1144217 date=1176412502]
My mum done one before. Long story short, about 3 people in a room of 8 doing one knew that the house owner tied a bit of fish wire to a book and they did it in the dark, and about 10 mins in he yanked the fish wire and everyone was screaming/laughing.

I’m doing one soon(2~ months).
[/quote]
Tape it and put it on YouTube ;)[/quote]

I will.

item.title: Ouija Boards
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

N00b1:

i cant say i have seen that movie if you make a board dose it work or is it more of got to be made by a witch? if you cam make one fancy looking up a guide?

Shoulda asked 2 posts earlier, there’s tons of sites. Apparently acording to my History teacher it has to be made by a certain type of wood, the glass has to be crystal or something and the writing has to be engraved with gold or silver… But, with what i’ve read it can be made with anything.

Just go to google and type in “How to make a Ouija Board” and see what comes up.

Read full topic

item.title: Ouija Boards
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

N00b1:

i know my mom played it with like 6 of here sisters and they talked to there grate grandmother who asked to see here mother and when they said she wernt there the glass shattered and i don’t think my mom made it up because when ive been with my antes ive just dropped them a hint about spirit in the glass and they said the story of that

I’d be pretty freaked if i got a pissed of demon, lol. If i knew they couldn’t do anything, i’d be find just talking to them/it. (I sound a little crazy)

My Mum told me she did it when she was a teen with some friends at a sleepover and it was in the kitchen. She said one of the knives rose, hovered for a bit and fell back down.

Have you seen the movie “Long Time Dead” ? It’s about a demon that escapes from the board and kills them one by one. It’s what got me so interested.

Read full topic

item.title: Ouija Boards
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

N00b1:

mopman so true even know people say its real i think you just want it to happen we call it a weji board here or spirit in the glass

en.wikipedia.org

Ideomotor phenomenon

The ideomotor phenomenon is a psychological phenomenon wherein a subject makes motions unconsciously. The ideomotor response (or ideomotor reflex), often abbreviated to IMR, is a concept in hypnosis and psychological research. It is derived from the terms "ideo" (idea, or mental representation) and "motor" (muscular action). The phrase is most commonly used in reference to the process whereby a thought or mental image brings about a seemingly "reflexive" or automatic muscular reaction, often of ...

“The ideomotor effect is a psychological phenomenon wherein a subject makes motions unconsciously (i.e., without conscious awareness). Automatic writing, dowsing, facilitated communication, and Ouija boards have also been attributed to the effect of this phenomena. Mystics have often attributed this motion to paranormal or supernatural force. Many subjects are unconvinced that their actions are originating solely from within themselves.”

Although it makes sense, what i am confused about is if two people are using the board and it is supposedly unknown muscle movements in a person, what if they both go a different way? Although they always seem to go the same way.

Weird.

Read full topic

I’m doing some research of them now, very interesting stuff.
